original_text: Then the man took me out through the north gate of the inside yard of the temple. We went into the outside yard. We arrived at a building that was in the north wall of the inside yard.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 밖으로 나가 북쪽 뜰로 가서 두 방에 이르니 그 두 방의 하나는 골방 앞 뜰을 향하였고 다른 하나는 북쪽 건물을 향하였는데

sentences.original_text: Then the man took me out
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 사람은 나를 데리고 나갔다

sentences.original_text: of the inside yard of the temple
We went into the outside yard
that was in the north wall
